name: Tuna Caliente
author: WebsByMegan
summary: Tuna gets jazzed up with jalepenos and a tangy lemon mayonnaise in this fun summer pasta salad. Serve over a bed of fresh iceburg lettuce. Use more or less jalapenos to suit your taste.
ingredients: 3 (5 ounce) cans water packed tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta shells and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente
Rinse under cold water until cool
In a large bowl, gently mix the cooled pasta, tuna, jalapeno peppers, onion, and celery
In a separate bowl, mix the mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon zest, mustard, and lemon juice
Stir the dressing mixture into the pasta salad to evenly coat
Season with salt and pepper, and chill until ready to serve
